actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require the Federal Bureau of Investigation to classify the offense of arson as a part I offense for purposes of the Uniform Crime Reporting Program and the Uniform Crime Reports for the United States.

summary.text: Requires the Federal Bureau of Investigation to classify the offense of arson as a part I offense for purposes of the Uniform Crime Reporting Program and the Uniform Crime Reports for the United States.

titles.title: A bill to require the Federal Bureau of Investigation to classify the offense of arson as a part I offense for purposes of the Uniform Crime Reporting Program and the Uniform Crime Reports for the United States.
